Directions: In a saucepan, saute onion in oil until tender. Stir in water, ketchup, vinegar, sugar, Worcestershire sauce, mustard, paprika and hot pepper sauce. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat; simmer, uncovered, for 15 minutes.

Cut hot dogs in half lengthwise and then widthwise. Place in a greased 11-in. x 7-in. x 2-in. baking dish. Top with sauce. Bake, uncovered, at 350 degrees F for 20-25 minutes or until heated through. Serve over rice.
